title: Cannot synchronize a .java file and another resource
description: When attempting to synchronize a .java file and another resource, the context menu does not display the 'Team' entry as expected.
OB: When opening the context menu, the 'Team' entry is missing.
EB: The 'Team' entry should be visible in the context menu.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Select a .java file and another resource (e.g. a .properties file) in the package viewer. 2. Open the context menu and observe that the 'Team' entry is not displayed.
